name: VGDA Dungeon Crawler
description:
Knight Fight is a Top Dungeon Crawler developed as a demo for the Beginner Unity Workshop hosted by VGDA.


Mechanics: Twin-stick movement
  • Full controller support & Keyboard Support
Items
  • Key drops
  • Health potions
Dialog 
  • Basic Interact Dialog System
Enemies
  • Goblin
  • Bat
  • Slime
